title: Kitchen Supervisor/Lead Cook
description:
Our company is currently seeking a highly motivated and experienced Kitchen Supervisor/Lead Cook to join our team. The ideal candidate will be capable of managing the kitchen during the absence of the Chef and will also be in charge of maintaining inventory, delegating tasks to employees, completing daily produce orders, maintaining a clean/organized kitchen and more. We are looking for a detail\-oriented professional who is passionate about food prep and truly enjoys working as part of a professional cooking team.  
Experience with cuisine is preferred but not required

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: From $27\.00 per hour

Benefits:

* Food provided
* Paid time off

Shift:

* 8 hour shift

Supplemental Pay:

* Performance bonus
* Quarterly bonus

Ability to Commute:

* Folsom, CA 95630 (Preferred)

Ability to Relocate:

* Folsom, CA 95630: Relocate before starting work (Preferred)

Work Location: In person
